game.title: Eternal Realms
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has been outlawed, players take on the role of a young apprentice who discovers they have the ability to wield ancient spells. As they journey through mystical realms, they must navigate treacherous landscapes and battle fearsome enemies to uncover the truth behind a centuries-old prophecy that foretells their destiny.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's character living in a small village on the outskirts of a vast kingdom. After discovering their magical abilities, they are pursued by ruthless agents of the ruling sorcerer-king who seeks to exploit their powers for his own gain.
game.ending: Ultimately, the player must confront the sorcerer-king and decide whether to use their powers to overthrow him or forge an alliance to save the realm from a greater threat: a dark force that has been growing in power since the outlawing of magic. The fate of Eternal Realms hangs in the balance.
